Coereba 0.99.2
  • Reference
    • Using Coereba

Package index

All functions

Coereba_App()
Deploy a Shiny app to modify the estimated gate cutoff placement.
Coereba_Comparison()
Compares two Coereba populations to find difference, returning either data or a plot of the marker expressions
Coereba_GateCutoffs()
Function to guess the gate cutoff values
Coereba_MarkerExpressions()
Generate overall marker expressions across Coereba clusters,
Coereba_MarkerExpressions2()
Generate overall marker expressions across Coereba clusters,
Coereba_Processing()
Takes Utility_Coereba output, plus additional metadata,and returns as a Bioconductor Summarized Experiment object
Coereba_UpdateGates()
Update a gate cutoff csv with the Coereba_App edits
Utility_Behemoth()
From a data.frame, runs stats on column of interest, and returns the ggplot for it.
Utility_Coereba()
Runs Coereba for Dichotomized Gating Annotation
Utility_Heatmap()
Produces a Coereba Heatmap showing Coereba Clusters by Markers
Utility_MarkerPlots()
Takes Coereba_MarkerExpressions data.frame and returns Marker Expression Beeswarm plots
Utility_Stats()
Normality Test followed by t-test/Anova
